function_call.name: classify_risks
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Existing technological, sociological, and operational barriers may hinder the impact of digital-health technologies."},{"name":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases within the group of contributors"},{"name":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases to other individuals due to interaction with contributors"},{"name":"Risk of bias or conflict of interest in the research due to the financial interests of contributors"},{"name":"Outbreak of a novel coronavirus disease"},{"name":"Global economic recession"},{"name":"Lack of sustainability in globalized system"},{"name":"Increased zoonotic infections due to deforestation and wildlife hunting"},{"name":"Deterioration of biodiversity reduces ecosystem functioning and protective effects against infectious diseases"},{"name":"Intensive animal husbandry promotes the appearance and spread of zoonotic diseases"},{"name":"Contagious diseases propagating in the built environment due to workforce shortage and structural limitations in food and health systems"},{"name":"Global health care systems reaching capacity limits"},{"name":"Severe restrictions to mobility exacerbating social inequalities"},{"name":"Economic recession highlighting risks associated with hyper-connected economic and financial systems"},{"name":"Global connectivity and trade promote the use of cheap and long-distance transportation, increasing the risk of contagious diseases spreading globally."},{"name":"Restricted mobility and economic activity during the covid-19 crisis led to improved air quality but uncertain impact on climate change and biodiversity conservation."},{"name":"Drop in greenhouse gas emissions during lockdowns, driven by reduced transportation and energy demand, drew attention."},{"name":"Prioritization of economy over sustainability may lead to relaxation of conservation policies and environmental measures."},{"name":"Financial support directed at incumbent industries with high employment may hinder the development of green energy technologies."},{"name":"Unsuitable use of global recovery funds could result in inadequate investment in sustainable energy development."},{"name":"Global reliance on fossil fuels and lack of subsidies for sustainable alternatives"},{"name":"Failure to achieve sustainable development goals sdgs by 2030"},{"name":"Lack of policies addressing the interrelation between biodiversity conservation, food security, and pandemic prevention"},{"name":"Tropical deforestation and wildlife trade increasing the risk of future zoonosis outbreaks"},{"name":"Economic growth contributing to biodiversity loss and environmental degradation"},{"name":"Prioritization of gdp over human well-being and healthy environment"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of environmental health in well-being measures"},{"name":"Overemphasis on socioeconomic welfare in well-being measures"},{"name":"Lack of compliance with public health measures"},{"name":"Lack of transparent and effective governance"},{"name":"Delay in implementing adequate controlling measures"},{"name":"Lack of adherence to collective actions"},{"name":"Inequality leading to social unrest"},{"name":"Inadequate institutional trust"},{"name":"Lack of regulation on air and water quality, leading to negative environmental consequences."},{"name":"Industrial towns experiencing unemployment due to the phase-out of polluting industries."},{"name":"Resistance to bottom-up planning and cultural preferences impacting environmental adaptation."},{"name":"Increased likelihood of contagious diseases due to individualistic societies and unsustainable consumption patterns"},{"name":"Detachment of people from the biosphere leading to difficulty in caring for nature"},{"name":"Shift in worldview from technological utopia to dependence on ecosystems"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 crisis"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through collaborative research and writing activities."},{"name":"High hiv prevalence in specific provinces"},{"name":"Age and marital status as predictors of hiv infection"},{"name":"Spatial clustering of hiv cases in specific provinces"},{"name":"Lack of access to gynecologic oncologist specialists for rural women with ovarian cancer"},{"name":"Disparities in referral rates for rural women with ovarian cancer"},{"name":"Longer time from diagnosis to surgery for rural women with ovarian cancer"},{"name":"Lack of proper ventilation in buildings can lead to airborne transmission of contagious diseases."},{"name":"Poor sanitation and hygiene practices can facilitate the spread of contagious diseases within buildings."}]}
